content.text:
# List of software for protein model error verification

This list of software for protein model error verification is a compilation of bioinformatics software frequently employed to check experimental and theoretical models of protein structures for errors.
{| border="0" align="center" style="border: 1px solid #999; background-color:#FFFFFF"
|-align="left" bgcolor="#CCCCCC"
! NAME
! Description || Methods || Link || Author
|-
| PROSESS - Protein Structure Evaluation Suite & Server
|  ||  || [http://prosess.ca/ PROSESS] ||
|-
| ResProx - resolution by proxy
|  ||  || [http://www.resprox.ca/ ResProx] ||
|-
| ANOLEA
|  ||  || [https://archive.today/20030503170129/http://www.swissmodel.unibas.ch/anolea/ ANOLEA] ||
|-
| NQ-Flipper
|  ||  || [https://flipper.services.came.sbg.ac.at/ NQ-Flipper] ||
|-
| Prosa
|  ||  || [http://www.came.sbg.ac.at/typo3/index.php?id=prosa ProSA] ||
|-
| QMEAN
|  ||  || [http://swissmodel.expasy.org/qmean/ QMEAN] ||
|-
| Verify3D
|  ||  || [https://web.archive.org/web/20090526070711/http://www.doe-mbi.ucla.edu/Services/Verify_3D/ Verify3D] ||
|-
| WHAT_CHECK
|  ||  || [http://swift.cmbi.ru.nl/gv/whatcheck/ WHAT_CHECK] || Gert Vriend
|-
|}
